translations: 不能赎回的；[金融] 不能兑现的；不可救药的

sentences.sentence: There seems to be no one they consider irredeemable.
sentences.translation: 看起来没有他们认为无可救药的人。

sentences.sentence: He is still, in the eyes of some, an irredeemable misogynist.
sentences.translation: 在某些人的眼里，他仍然是个无可救药的厌恶女性者。

sentences.sentence: "I do look forward to it, because I do love playing someone so irredeemable," he says.
sentences.translation: “我很期待，因为我喜欢扮演如此不可救药的角色，”他说。
